channel.title: Crashing
channel.description:
Okay today I came across a tricky problem with my server. Everytime I come back from doing something my server is always crashed, the run.bat is just closed no nulling or anything. I have anti-syi and everyone no one is doing that type of crap, which I am very sure on this fact. What else could be causing my server to crash, this problem has started today.
Also, if you could tell me any solution to fixing the crashing or a restarter that can restart the server when it detects a crash.
Thanks, MrPanda

item.title: Crashing
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

The source it self is nulled or one of the files within is nulled/corrupt.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Is_ze_best Mopar Is ze best
item.description:
@Mopar_Is_ze_best wrote:

[quote=“alpha 0nx, post:2, topic:338737”]Well This could be a number of things. Outdated Java, messed up client.java, messed up server.java, etc. Here is What I would recommend to do.

[ol][li]Restart your computer[/li]
[li](if 1 doesn’t work) Download an updated Java[/li]
[li](if 1 AND 2 doesn’t work) Download a New Source[/li][/ol]

If none of these work, then you may need an expert’s help.

Plz reply if this does or doesn’t work.[/quote]

If I experience crashing again I will try these it has successfully not crashed in an hour.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

Well This could be a number of things. Outdated Java, messed up client.java, messed up server.java, etc. Here is What I would recommend to do.

[ol][li]Restart your computer[/li]
[li](if 1 doesn’t work) Download an updated Java[/li]
[li](if 1 AND 2 doesn’t work) Download a New Source[/li][/ol]

If none of these work, then you may need an expert’s help.

Plz reply if this does or doesn’t work.

Read full topic
